Node.definition: = referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which a deity shows his majesty and greatness ◄ by his actions, ► which is a reason for praise
= action by which a deity shows his majesty and greatness ◄ by his actions, ► which is a reason for praise

= large domesticated solid hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot
= action by which humans ride on a domestic animal such as a donkey (חֲמֹור) or a horse (סוּס) or in a chariot (מֶרְכָּבָה)
= action by which humans cause (other) humans or objects to move in a particular direction, usually with force
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
poetic term: = words set to music|= a deity that is the source of someone's strength
= short form of יהוה (יהוה) only found in poetic texts
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= indirect male progenitor
= action by which humans acknowledge the elevated status of deities and give expression to that
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: a person of battle; hence: = a person that is of age and physically able to bear arms
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= open vehicle with two or four wheels, pulled by one or more horses; ◄ made or wood and iron; ► used in war or for travelling
= king of Egypt

= an organized military force equipped for fighting on land; this term denotes primarily the foot soldiers, though it can also be used to refer to the entire fighting force, including chariots and horsemen
= causative action by which humans or deities throw an object in a certain direction, often with force
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= state in which persons or objects have been selected for their superior competencies or quality
= process by which someone or something is caused to move into a space of restricted movement

= bodies of water located east of Egypt and south of Israel; possibly referring to the Gulf of Suez and/or to the Gulf of Aqaba off the Red Sea|= northern part of Gulf of Suez; ► location where the Israelites (יִשְׂרָאֵל) crossed over into the Sinai (סִינַי) peninsula on their way out of Egypt (מִצְרַיִם)

meaning unsure; probably: = a reed like plant, which grows in water and reaches a height of up to 3 m high; its fuzzy brown seed head becomes fluffy and blows away in the wind; ◄ Typha genus; ► used for baskets and mats; its roots are edible

= great body of water located around and under the surface of the earth; when the world was newly created this water used to cover the earth as well; the subterranean water comes up to the surface of the earth through springs
= state or process by which a surface is covered by another object, ► often making this surface more or less invisible

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to fall down|to sink down|to descend
Node.definition: = process by which objects move (involuntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

= an object ◄ of stone, ► usually found in nature and used for throwing, building crude constructions; stones with a particular shape are sometimes used as a memorial or religious symbol; ≈ regarded as extremely common, easily available, but also as strong, hard, and unflexible
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun

Node.gloss: to be great|to be majestic|to be glorious
Node.definition: = to inspire awe and respect
= state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= state in which humans or deities have an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified

Node.gloss: to tear down|to demolish|to ruin|to raze|to overthrow
Node.definition: = causative action by which someone tears down a construction

Node.gloss: to send|to cause to happen|to stir up
Node.definition: literally: to send; hence: = causative action by which deities cause an event to happen
= process by which deities experience extreme displeasure, ◄ described as an internal fire
= action by which people or objects are removed from existence in a violent way ◄ as food that is eaten

= dry grass like remnant of wheat or another grain crop following the harvest; this term possibly refers to two kinds of material, one being the remnant of the crop remaining in the ground, the other being the unwanted residue of stalks; ► only used for brick making; ≈ usually considered of little value and needing to be separated from the grain itself; maybe burned

= a natural movement of air, blowing in a particular direction, ranging in intensity from a light breeze to a heavy blast ; ≈ often regarded as the breath of God, but also associated with things that are without substance and cannot be grasped
= the two external openings in the nose

Node.gloss: to be heaped up|to be piled up
Node.definition: = to take on the shape of a heap or pile
= state in which humans, deities or animals place themselves in a certain location in an upright position
= a large quantity of water, staying together as one heap as if it were a solid substance

Node.gloss: to set|to thicken|to congeal|to become concentrated
Node.definition: = process by which liquids become relatively more solid than before ► and so flow less easily or completely stop flowing

= great body of water located around and under the surface of the earth; when the world was newly created this water used to cover the earth as well; the subterranean water comes up to the surface of the earth through springs
literally: heart; hence: = the location right in the middle of something else, such as the sea, the heavens, or a tree
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= action by which humans succeed to catch up with other humans after having pursued them
= action by which humans divide an object (or range of objects) into portions and share them out among each other
= process by which someone's desire finds relief

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
= causative action by which humans or deities take over the ownership of land from other humans, which usually implies that the former owners are driven away
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event

= a natural movement of air, blowing in a particular direction, ranging in intensity from a light breeze to a heavy blast ; ≈ often regarded as the breath of God, but also associated with things that are without substance and cannot be grasped
= state or process by which a surface is covered by another object, ► often making this surface more or less invisible
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= a heavy bluish grey soft metal, ≈ associated with heavy weight
= pertaining to inspiring awe and respect ◄ because of one's beauty, size, strength, or status

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to be great|to be majestic|to be glorious
Node.definition: = to inspire awe and respect

= state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well
= state in which humans, deities, places and activities have qualities that inspire fear in others
= a deed that merits appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
literally: to stretch out (one's) arm; hence: = action by which deities prepare to punish to humans
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
= action by which humans or animals cause food to pass down from their mouth to their esophagus; ≈ often used figuratively to denote destruction and death

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received

= causative action by which humans or deity deliver an individual or group of people from the power of someone else or from difficult circumstances, ► which usually implies that the one who performed the act of deliverance has the right to claim the ones he delivered for himself

= causative action by which humans or deities help (other) humans or animals to journey from one place to the other by accompanying them and providing them with resources and protection whenever necessary
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals

Node.gloss: to tremble|to shake|to quake|to be disturbed|to be perturbed|to be excited|to flutter
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects shake involuntarily; ◄ typically as a result of fear, insecurity, shock, excitement, or other emotions
= state of strong fear and distress, compared to the state of mind of a woman in labor; ► often accompanied by physical side effects, like writhing and trembling

Node.gloss: to grasp|to take hold of (something)|to seize|to catch|to hold on (to something)
Node.definition: = to take hold of someone or something; humans typically do this with their hands and animals use their mouths; however, it is often extended to include inanimate objects (traps), personalized qualities (wisdom), emotions (anger, fear), or processes (time)
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= land of the Philistines (פְּלִשְׁתִּי) situated along the coast of the Meditteranean and concentrated around the cities of Gaza (עַזָּה) Gath (גַּת) Ekron (עֶקְרֹון) Ashdod (אַשְׁדֹּוד) and Ashkelon (אַשְׁקְלֹון)
= referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future

Node.gloss: to be in anguish|to be dismayed
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience a great fear combined with severe distress, often accompanied by physical symptoms, such trembling and pain
= person in a position of leadership over a tribe or clan
= nation; ◄ considered descendants of Esau (עֵשָׂו)
= person who has a position of leadership
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)

Node.gloss: to grasp|to take hold of (something)|to seize|to catch|to hold on (to something)
Node.definition: = to take hold of someone or something; humans typically do this with their hands and animals use their mouths; however, it is often extended to include inanimate objects (traps), personalized qualities (wisdom), emotions (anger, fear), or processes (time)
= process by which the human body shakes, ◄ as a result of fear
literally: to melt; hence: = process by which people are strongly affected by fear
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= the region inhabited by people who were regarded as descendants of Canaan, son of Ham (חָם) son of Noah (נֹחַ) settled by Abram (אַבְרָם)
literally: to fall (upon someone); hence: = process by which humans are affected by a certain condition, emotion, or supernatural influence
= state of strong fear because of an actual or perceived danger, such as aggression from the enemy, a dangerous animal, or death
= process by which someone experiences extreme fear, ► which may be accompanied by visible symptoms such as trembling
= state in which an event has a high intensity
= each of the two upper limbs of the body, including the shoulder and extending until the hand; ≈ directly associated with strength and power

Node.gloss: to stand still|to be still|to wait
Node.definition: = to refrain from moving

= an object ◄ of stone, ► usually found in nature and used for throwing, building crude constructions; stones with a particular shape are sometimes used as a memorial or religious symbol; ≈ regarded as extremely common, easily available, but also as strong, hard, and unflexible
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y

Node.gloss: to acquire|to obtain|to purchase|to buy|to reclaim
Node.definition: = action by which humans acquire an animate or inanimate object ◄ by means of a financial transaction or in another way

= action of placing a seed or small plant in the ground so that it will grow and produce ≈ used symbolically to describe God's act of giving the people of Israel their own land, as promised to their ancestors
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= a firm location, suitable for building upon; ≈ often used for the place where the temple of God was built
= a location that has been chosen by humans or deities as their dwelling place
= action by which a person or deity carries out some purposeful activity, in order to create something or cause something to happen
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= place that has been consecrated to a deity, where that deity is said to reside and is worshiped
= causative action by which humans or deities cause an object to be firmly located in a certain place
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= an adverb that specifies unending time

= large domesticated solid hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot
= king of Egypt
= a group of chariots (מֶרְכָּבָה) usually owned by one single person
= soldier riding a horse
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

Node.gloss: to take back|to bring back|to return|to put back|to restore (something)
Node.definition: literally: to turn; hence: = causative action by which animals, humans, deities cause (other) animals, humans, or objects to move back to a location where they have been before
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= earth not covered by water
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= woman; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► elder sister of Moses (מֹשֶׁה) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן)
= female person speaking on behalf of a deity
= daughter of one's father, whether from the same mother or not; ≈ sometimes associated with affection; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) brother of Moses (מֹשֶׁה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► first high priest (כֹּהֵן)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= musical instrument, consisting of a membrane, usually of animal skin, which was stretched over a shallow circular, triangular, or square frame; ► it was struck sharply with one or two hands, depending on where it was situated; it could be held in one hand, under the arm, or against the chest and struck with the other hand, or it could be held on the knees or the ground and struck with one or two hands; the fingers of one hand could be used to tighten or loosen the tension on the membrane as it was struck

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y

= musical instrument, consisting of a membrane, usually of animal skin, which was stretched over a shallow circular, triangular, or square frame; ► it was struck sharply with one or two hands, depending on where it was situated; it could be held in one hand, under the arm, or against the chest and struck with the other hand, or it could be held on the knees or the ground and struck with one or two hands; the fingers of one hand could be used to tighten or loosen the tension on the membrane as it was struck
= action by which humans dance a round dance; ≈ associated with joy
= action by which humans produce musical sounds with their voice, often as a celebratory response, either set to a prescribed tune or spontaneous
= woman; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► elder sister of Moses (מֹשֶׁה) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן)
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which a deity shows his majesty and greatness ◄ by his actions, ► which is a reason for praise
= action by which a deity shows his majesty and greatness ◄ by his actions, ► which is a reason for praise

= large domesticated solid hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot
= action by which humans cause (other) humans or objects to move in a particular direction, usually with force
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

Node.gloss: to cause to depart|to lead out|to drive out
Node.definition: literally to make (someone) pluck up (their tent pegs); hence: = causative action by which humans or deities cause a relatively large company of humans, together with their possessions, to depart from a place where they had set up a temporary residence
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= bodies of water located east of Egypt and south of Israel; possibly referring to the Gulf of Suez and/or to the Gulf of Aqaba off the Red Sea|= northern part of Gulf of Suez; ► location where the Israelites (יִשְׂרָאֵל) crossed over into the Sinai (סִינַי) peninsula on their way out of Egypt (מִצְרַיִם)

meaning unsure; probably: = a reed like plant, which grows in water and reaches a height of up to 3 m high; its fuzzy brown seed head becomes fluffy and blows away in the wind; ◄ Typha genus; ► used for baskets and mats; its roots are edible

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals
= location ◄ east of Egypt
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= state in which a countable entity is three in number

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals
= process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

= location ◄ in the wilderness of Etham (אֵתָם) ► where the Israelites (יִשְׂרָאֵל) encamped shortly after crossing the Sea of Reeds (יָם־סוּף) on their way from Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) to Canaan (כְּנַעַן) here bitter water was made drinkable

mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

= location ◄ in the wilderness of Etham (אֵתָם) ► where the Israelites (יִשְׂרָאֵל) encamped shortly after crossing the Sea of Reeds (יָם־סוּף) on their way from Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) to Canaan (כְּנַעַן) here bitter water was made drinkable
= state in which a substance has a sharp, pungent taste, ≈ associated with desperation and distress
literally: to cry out (someone's) name (something); hence: = action by which humans assign a name to a person or place
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

= location ◄ in the wilderness of Etham (אֵתָם) ► where the Israelites (יִשְׂרָאֵל) encamped shortly after crossing the Sea of Reeds (יָם־סוּף) on their way from Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) to Canaan (כְּנַעַן) here bitter water was made drinkable
= action by which humans express their dissatisfaction to those in charge
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to acquire knowledge, a skill, or a certain type of behavior
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit
= state in which food tastes well

Node.gloss: to place (responsibility on someone) > to lay upon|to bring upon|to impose upon|to charge with|to commit to
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities hold (other) humans responsible for an event that has taken place or that is to take place in the future
= a pattern of behavior required by somebody in authority
literally: a ruling or decision; hence: = a law or ordinance handed down by a ruler or a deity that a particular group of people is expected to obey

Node.gloss: to test|to put to the test
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities make an effort to obtain information about (other) humans by observing them while they engage in a certain activity

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= state in which an event is morally and ethically right

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= to agree to a request or command and perform it
= action by which humans or deities act in accordance with a certain (usually) prescribed pattern of behavior, such as a law, covenant, etc.
= a pattern of behavior required by somebody in authority
= state in which humans lack physical strength, ◄ caused by sickness or injury
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which humans or deities cause an event to happen ◄ as if it were an object placed in a certain position
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= causative action by which humans or deities cause an event to happen ◄ as if it were an object placed in a certain position
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= someone whose profession it is to help other people heal or recover from a disease or an accident; also used as an epithet for God

= location ◄ in Sinai (סִינַי) Peninsula, not far from the Sea of Reeds (יָם־סוּף) containing twelve springs of water and seventy palm trees; ► the Israelites (יִשְׂרָאֵל) encamped there on their way from Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) to Canaan (כְּנַעַן)
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= hole in the earth that gives access to the subterranean water which either comes to the surface or can be drawn from it
= state in which a countable entity is seventy in number

= a type of palm tree, which reaches a height of 10 20 m and has a cluster of large leaves at the top; ◄ Phoenix dactylifera; ► it is cultivated for its edible sweet fruit, about the size of a human thumb, which grows in clusters; ≈ it is symbol of elegance and grace

Node.gloss: to set up (a tent)|to erect (a tent)|to encamp
Node.definition: = action by which an individual or group of people settles in a certain location for a limited period of time and often for a specific purpose
